attributes.action: Reject the proposals forcing ISP's to disconnect those who illegally download music or movies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are supposed to live in a free market economy. Where the market is decided by the consumer, not the companies using government legislation to control the market. This is what the rich monopolous music and film companies try to do. They try to block the new innovations in software to allow them to maintain there business model and therefore maintain their money stream. This isn't acceptable.

But there is more to this. It seems to be unworkable you will simply get a new wave of cross-platform viruses with disasterous consequences. They will lead to the disconnection of thousands of peoples internet connection. Since they will be able to behind the scenes download illegal files. It seems there will be no way around this.

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
